remarks: Truth implied by equality of a restricted class abstraction and a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
rabsnt.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
rabsnt.2 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rabsnt $p |- ( { x e. A | ph } = { B } -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
